You must join them first.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Join new test only when a test you are participating in is over.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you committed to participate in Test Cycle, please join the test - your activities and performance will be monitored automatically and by EPAM Crowd Coordinator. We need to ensure Customer will get proper testing results during testing time frame.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If something interrupted you or other circumstances appeared and you cannot proceed with the Test - please inform your Team Leader. Then we will involve other Testers from the Crowd to cover resourcing gaps.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once your Project assignment is confirmed and you become not available for testing, please make sure you don't have planned Test Cycle or Test Cycles in progress. If this happens - inform your Team Leader/EPAM Crowd Coordinator.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you become part of the EPAM Crowd for the first time, you will be automatically assigned to the special position under EPM-CRWD project with 0 workload.\\nTime spent for crowdtesting activities will appear automatically in Time next day after testing. Time calculation is based on your activity in test IO tests.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"General rule: time passes to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://time.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in 24 hours after test compl\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://time.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"etion. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Test cases:  Only the actual time spent in the test case goes to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://time.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If you quit a test case OR the time allotted for the test case has expired, time won’t pass to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://time.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If your execution was rejected, time passes to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://time.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" anyways.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Exploratory:  Test Session time goes to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://time.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time.epam.com.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a0cb5240-9293-4d9f-baac-b960069efde9/image2020-3-31_15-41-58.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":731,\"height\":377}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are currently on the bench and time related to the crowd tests doesn't appear and you need to fill in Time, please use 'OTH - Other section' to report bench time (up to 8 hours). Then next day\\\\week please check your Time - if there were any updates regarding testIO activities, please adjust time appropriately.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are not on the bench, no need to add time manually, you should keep reporting to your Project as usual.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Testing is mainly carried out on your workstation or using\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://mobilecloud.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Mobile Cloud\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Mobitru). But if you want to test on own device(s) - it's not forbidden. In the same time it would be not valid to reject test invitation because you don't have proper device if such device is available in\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://mobilecloud.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Mobile Cloud\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Mobitru).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disclosing any information/details/screens about the Customer data and the test in any form is forbidden.
